LICENSE
PLATES

THAT COULDA BEEN



One thing to note, here, is the New Yorkers are creative. Between 2010 and 2014, only 8 license plates that were ultimately rejected were requested more than once.

BAD2SS was requested three times -- twice in November 2010 and once again in October 2011.
